summary.p: This module enable SSL encryption for a specified port. It takes advantage of the SSL encryption functionality that is built into the NetWare operating system.

directivesynopsis.name: SecureListen
directivesynopsis.description: Enables SSL encryption for the specified port

usage.p: Specifies the port and the eDirectory based certificate name that will be used to enable SSL encryption. An optional third parameter also enable mutual authentication.

Specifies a list of client certificate files (DER format) that are used when creating a proxied SSL connection. Each client certificate used by a server must be listed separately in its own .der file.
